periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 4am and 5am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers. Partly cloudy, with a low around 63. South southwest wind around 1 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers before 8am, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 87, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 1 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 66, with temperatures rising to around 68 overnight. South wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 84. South southwest wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 66. South southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 81. South wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 66. South wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 79. Southwest wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 66. South southeast wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 7am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7am and 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 78. East southeast wind around 7 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 63. East northeast wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 75. North wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 76. West southwest wind 3 to 7 mph.
